text: Sneezeweed is a common name for several plants in the family Asteraceae and may refer to: *Achillea ptarmica, with white flowers *Hymenoxys hoopesii, with long yellow petals, native to western North America *Various species of Helenium, with short yellow petals, native to North and Central America *In Australia, Centipeda cunninghamii or "old man weed" is also referred to as common sneezeweed
title: Sneezeweed
